headline: Feel the Love. Stop the Hate. Find your 'Normal'.
description: You're smart. You probably kicked ass in school. But why in the world is food so hard to figure out? If this is one area of your life that you feel out of control with you, get ready to rally. You'll never be the same.
offer: Join us and 27+ world renowned thought leaders as we change the dialogue around dieting and body confidence.
